flawed_nl_solution:
Josiah is 15 x 3 = <<15*3=54>>54 years old now.
In three years, Josiah will be 54 + 3 = <<54+3=57>>57 years old.
Hans will be 15 + 3 = <<15+3=18>>18 years old in three years.
So, the sum of their ages in three years is 57 + 18 = <<57+18=75>>75 years old.
#### 75

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 45, not 54. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
